alert.note: Alert for Mercer; Summers (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 5:11AM EST until January 11 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following county, Giles and southeast West Virginia, including the following counties, Mercer and Summers. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 508 AM EST, gauge reports indicated streams and small rivers near flood stage along the Bluestone River and also along Walker Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pearisburg, Narrows, Pembroke, Athens, Poplar Hill, Pipestem and Camp Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
